name: Ultimate Sniper
description:
Meant to be played with friends!

Just call some friends and have fun playing the game and show them you are the best.

You can choose between LAN and ONLINE.

Dare to feel all the sensations that a soldier can have in the war, through the different
Maps and game modes that includes Ultimate Sniper.
Located in the current wars and through our beautiful realistic environment. Ultimate Sniper will make you feel the complete experience of a sniper.
You will need a lot of skill and reflexes to be better than the other players. You must find a good place in the field to kill as many players as possible, but avoid being killed
at the same time.
